item.title: Academic seminar
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to visit the LEFMI UPJV Laboratory at the Universit√© de Picardie Jules Verne (UPJV) in Amiens, France, where she delivered an academic presentation titled “Raining on Bonds: The Impact of Extreme Rainfall on Local Financing Costs.”
